collect.title: 1. Information We Collect
collect.content: We collect information you provide directly to us when you create an account, including your name, email address, and profile information.

use.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
use.content: We use the information we collect to provide, maintain, and improve our services, to communicate with you, and to protect the security of our platform.

security.title: 3. Data Security
security.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access or disclosure.

contact.title: 4. Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at privacy@hypehire.com
